title: Updates
body: hello so i'm having a problem that is happening often i try to log in and i get an update that no one else is getting and its always between 1610-1613 mb this is the 3rd time i'm getting it my brother is playing beside me and he doesn't get any updates neither do other people get it what should i do ?

replies.body: Your security settings might be blocking your game files from being read properly, so it's getting you stuck there on login.  The steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide can help make sure any settings, firewall, or antivirus is cleared of any blocks.
Maybe reinstall the whole client and the game could help , but I am not 100% sure.
